revision.text: <!-- XP per Minute Calculation Logic: Use Minimum XP/Min from a level 0 Sprayduck, do not account for Boost Mulch. Cheri berry growth time: 30 seconds Level 0 Sprayduck boost: x1.25 Growth Speed Sprayduck boosted Cheri berry growth time: 30 / 1.25 = 24 seconds 60/24 = 2.5 harvests per minute Cheri Berry gives 1 point per harvest, so points per minute is 2.5*1 = 2.5. Putting this into 1 equation: 60 seconds / (30 seconds /1.25 sprayduck bonus) * berryXP = 60 / (24) * 1 = 2.5 {{ #expr: expression }} is the wiki performing the calculation itself round2 at the end of the expr rounds the calculation to 2 decimal places
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
